findings.title: Administrative service exposed: ssh
findings.description: Port 22/tcp is open running ssh. Administrative services should typically not be exposed externally.
findings.impact: SSH provides administrative access if credentials are compromised
findings.remediation: Ensure SSH is properly configured with key-based authentication and disable root login

findings.title: Open http service
findings.impact: Service http on port 80 increases attack surface
findings.remediation: Review if http needs to be exposed and implement appropriate access controls
